verbose_text: Short-term treatment with the AT1R blocker candesartan on SHRSP during the prehypertension period prevented hypertensive end organ damage, including cerebral edema, after maturation, by at least partially inhibiting local RAS.
evidence: AT1R blocker candesartan on SHRSP during the prehypertension period prevented hypertensive end organ damage, including cerebral edema, after maturation, by at least partially inhibiting local RAS
